Real Madrid: Iniesta was in the sights of Merengue!
Andr√©s Iniesta narrates a funny anecdote. Throughout his career, the former master of Bar√ßa had regular contact with ... Real Madrid!
01 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Mourad Bennis



Real MadridA new era is opening in Madrid. After a white season, Casa Blanca has released heavy artillery to strengthen this summer. What compete with Bar√ßa in Liga and glimpse a umpteenth Champions League.Icon Sport

Real Madrid: the eleven possible for the season




Andr√©s Iniesta, the brilliant Spanish midfielder who is today the greatest happiness of Japanese fans, said that Real Madrid has repeatedly inquired about his case.




Iniesta interested Real Madrid




Andr√©s Iniesta + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Andr√©s Iniesta, now 35 years old, made the good days of FC Barcelona for several seasons. His technical correctness, his passes and his displacements aroused admiration. Even in Madrid's enemy. Indeed, Iniesta reveals, in an interview with Marca, that Real Madrid has seriously considered his case.
"The contact still exists, as I said before, it's not something new.In the end, the people around you receive information, calls ... But not because it's Madrid but because they also had it, not during my entire career, but at some point, there have always been contacts from other clubs, this can happen to any player. "
Iniesta added: "A lot of things have circulated about this (Real Madrid interest) but in the end I arrived at Bar√ßa at 12 and my goal was to succeed there."
